recipes.title: Creamy Garlic Tuscan Chicken
recipes.description: Tender chicken breasts in a creamy garlic Parmesan sauce with sun-dried tomatoes and spinach.
instructions: Season the chicken with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the chicken for 4-5 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, sauté garlic for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in the cream and chicken broth, then stir in Parmesan, sun-dried tomatoes, and Italian seasoning. Simmer for 3-4 minutes.
Add spinach and let it wilt.
Return the chicken to the pan and simmer for another 2-3 minutes until heated through and coated with sauce.

recipes.title: Spicy Garlic Butter Ramen
recipes.description: Quick and comforting ramen with a rich garlic-butter sauce, chili heat, and a jammy egg.
instructions: Cook ramen noodles according to package and drain.
In a pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and chili flakes, sauté 30 seconds.
Add soy sauce and brown sugar. Stir well.
Toss in cooked noodles to coat.
Crack egg in center, cover with lid, steam 1-2 mins until egg is jammy.
Top with green onions and serve hot.

recipes.title: Mango Avocado Summer Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing tropical salad with juicy mangoes, creamy avocado, and a zesty lime dressing.
instructions: Combine mango, avocado, red onion, and cilantro in a bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk olive oil, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and gently toss.
Serve chilled or fresh.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Glazed Salmon
recipes.description: Pan-seared salmon fillets coated in a sticky honey garlic sauce—sweet, savory, and ready in minutes.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add salmon fillets skin-side down and cook for 3-4 mins.
Flip and cook the other side for another 3 mins.
Mix honey, soy sauce, garlic, lemon juice, and pepper. Pour into pan.
Spoon sauce over salmon until glazed and sticky.
Serve with steamed rice or veggies.

recipes.title: Classic Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.description: A warm and comforting tomato basil soup, perfect for chilly evenings.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot. Sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add crushed tomatoes, broth, salt, and pepper. Bring to a simmer.
Add basil and simmer for 15-20 mins.
Blend soup until smooth (or leave chunky).
Stir in coconut milk if using, heat through, and serve.

recipes.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Bites
recipes.description: Deliciously healthy snack bites made with oats, chocolate, and peanut butter. No oven needed!
instructions: In a bowl, combine all ingredients.
Mix until everything sticks together well.
Roll into small bite-sized balls.
Refrigerate for 30 mins to set.
Store in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 1 week.
